name: The Edge of Infinity
description:
This game was originally created for a school project.

The Edge of Infinity is my first delve into Interactive Fictions. This is a science-fiction game where you explore different routes in a time loop. Your choices will bring you to new information as you unravel the story within the chaos.

You are being held on a prison space station when some unknown event allows you to flee. Your escape is short-lived as you start to have strange visions that detail events of your life, or at least you think they do. You can either accept your fate or choose to explore the ensuing time loop to learn more about your situation.

____________________________________________________

I have no real plans to update this game, unless if there are things players would like to see.
